Header.title: We are Ecoeats
Header.paragraph: EcoEats is a comprehensive solution designed to manage inventory and track expiry dates for a wide range of food products. With EcoEats, you can keep a detailed record of your food items, ensuring that nothing goes to waste. By accurately monitoring expiry dates, users can reduce food waste and make more informed decisions about meal planning and shopping. EcoEats is a valuable tool for promoting sustainability and efficient food management practices.

Features.title: Inventory Management
Features.text: See what's in your fridge and pantry along with their expiry dates.

Features.title: Expiry Date Predictions
Features.text: Get an estimated expiry date for your fresh produce and know if its already gone stale.

Features.title: Infomation and Education
Features.text: Learn more about how to manage and efficiently utilise food to generate less food waste!

Features.title: Recommended Recipes
Features.text: Get tailored recipes at your fingertips using the food items from your inventory.
